SVGLengthListReplaceItem.summary: The replaceItem() method of the interface replaces an existing item in the list with a new item. If the new item is already in a list, it is removed from its previous list before it is inserted into this list. The inserted item is the item itself and not a copy. If the item is already in this list, note that the index of the item to replace is before the removal of the item.
SVGLengthListReplaceItem.returns: The that was added the list.
